A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: yes\, this movie sucks and is a disgrace.    I am more interested in rt's frozen \"47%\"; rating - I have been monitoring the review feed for some months now and am convinced with high confidence this score is simply rigged.  When will it tick down to 46%\, you ask?  The answer is never - your reviews do not count here.  Look for yourself - page after page of terrible reviews\, yet somehow we are supposed to believe the stats are roughly 1:1 \"fresh\" to \"rotten?\"  Here is why. this movie's enigmatic critic score\, far greater than the audience score\, represents a bona fide enterprise risk for rt's business model.  everyone expects the critic score < audience score because the audience self-selects\, and no one complains if they are pleasantly surprised.  but having the phenom go the other way sheds a nasty light on how beholden critics are to disney as a massive corporation\, their herding behavior\, and thus the lack of a fidelitous relationship b/n the aggregated critics' score and audience enjoyment.  which is to say\, this sheds an embarrassing light on rt's value-added for consumers\, and audience scores have been thus frozen at 47% (should be 20-25% based off available sampling). https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CWPAbKEmd5M\n   All the talk about \"half stars\" not counting is not true; they have frozen the score to stop further\, embarassing bad press of this issue.
